attic moisture detected.reason: Signs of moisture in attic. Must address source before insulating.
attic moisture detected.recommendation: Inspect roof, flashing, or ventilation. Document and resolve moisture issue before proceeding.
attic moisture detected.visual_cue: Moisture stains, discoloration, or mold on attic sheathing or insulation

open electrical junction box.reason: Live electrical wiring visible in an open box. Immediate safety hazard.
open electrical junction box.recommendation: Cover with a code-compliant junction box lid or have a licensed electrician correct the wiring.
open electrical junction box.visual_cue: Uncovered box with visible wires or wire nuts

bathroom fan not vented to exterior.reason: Bathroom exhaust fan venting into attic or crawlspace introduces moisture and mold risk.
bathroom fan not vented to exterior.recommendation: Reroute fan duct to terminate outside via gable, roof, or wall cap.
bathroom fan not vented to exterior.visual_cue: Fan duct visible ending in attic or crawl, no exterior termination

unsealed rim joist.reason: Unsealed rim joist cavity allows air leakage and heat loss.
unsealed rim joist.recommendation: Air seal and insulate rim joist with spray foam or rigid board.
unsealed rim joist.visual_cue: Exposed concrete or wood at box sill without air seal

flue pipe rusted or disconnected.reason: Rusted or disconnected flue pipe may cause backdraft or CO hazard.
flue pipe rusted or disconnected.recommendation: Replace flue pipe or reconnect with proper slope and clearance.
flue pipe rusted or disconnected.visual_cue: Flue pipe with visible corrosion or gaps near joints

no CO alarm present.reason: CO alarms are required in homes with combustion appliances per IHWAP.
no CO alarm present.recommendation: Install UL-listed CO alarm outside sleeping area.
no CO alarm present.visual_cue: No visible CO detector near bedrooms or appliances

knob and tube wiring in attic.reason: Insulating over knob and tube wiring is prohibited due to fire risk.
knob and tube wiring in attic.recommendation: Defer insulation until wiring is upgraded or removed.
knob and tube wiring in attic.visual_cue: Cloth-wrapped wiring visible in attic ceiling bays

duct not sealed in crawlspace.reason: Leaky ductwork in crawlspace causes energy loss and moisture risk.
duct not sealed in crawlspace.recommendation: Seal duct with mastic and verify airflow to conditioned space.
duct not sealed in crawlspace.visual_cue: Unsealed duct joints, open ends, or sagging flex in crawl

unsealed vapor barrier in crawl.reason: Vapor barrier not sealed allows ground moisture into building envelope.
unsealed vapor barrier in crawl.recommendation: Seal seams, piers, and perimeter of vapor barrier with tape or adhesive.
unsealed vapor barrier in crawl.visual_cue: Plastic sheeting loose or gapped near foundation

combustion appliance room lacks ventilat.reason: Mechanical room requires make-up air or venting for safe combustion.
combustion appliance room lacks ventilat.recommendation: Install louvered door or passive vent to meet combustion air needs.
combustion appliance room lacks ventilat.visual_cue: Sealed furnace closet with no vent or louver

broken or cracked window pane.reason: Broken windows can compromise envelope integrity and occupant safety.
broken or cracked window pane.recommendation: Repair or replace window before proceeding with air sealing or insulation.
broken or cracked window pane.visual_cue: Cracked or shattered glass in sash or storm window

exterior dryer vent missing backdraft da.reason: Missing damper allows pest intrusion, backdraft, and air leakage.
exterior dryer vent missing backdraft da.recommendation: Install exterior vent with integrated backdraft damper.
exterior dryer vent missing backdraft da.visual_cue: Dryer vent hood open or no flap visible

ceiling cavity with active structural sa.reason: Sagging ceiling may indicate structural failure or moisture compromise.
ceiling cavity with active structural sa.recommendation: Defer until ceiling structure is assessed and stabilized.
ceiling cavity with active structural sa.visual_cue: Visible bowing or collapse of ceiling finish materials
